    com.mongodb.client.model.DBCollectionFindOptions.isOplogReplay()
    oplogReplay has been deprecated in MongoDB 4.4.
    com.mongodb.client.model.DBCollectionFindOptions.oplogReplay(boolean)
    oplogReplay has been deprecated in MongoDB 4.4.
    com.mongodb.DBCursor.explain()
    com.mongodb.DBCursor.oplogReplay(boolean)
    oplogReplay has been deprecated in MongoDB 4.4.
    com.mongodb.MongoClient.getDB(String)
    This method is not currently scheduled for removal, but prefer MongoClient.getDatabase(String) for new code. Note that DB and MongoDatabase can be used together in the same application, with the same instance.
